full_summary:
### Tender Notice for Vector Network Analyzer

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal for a Vector Network Analyzer

#### Reference Number
202403929

#### Tender Closing Date
2024-02-08T14:00:00

#### Contact Information
Julie Frigon, Procurement and Contracting, Royal Canadian Mounted Police
73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2
Telephone: (613) 794-2047
Email: [julie.frigon@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.frigon@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)

#### Background
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires two (2) Vector Network Analyzers (or equivalent) to be delivered in the Northwest Territory. This procurement is open to invited Supply Arrangement Holders under supply arrangement E60HN-16ELEC/XXX/HN, qualified under Stream 2: Electronic Products.

#### Invitation to Bid
The following seven suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

1. Anixter - E60HN-16ELEC/001/HN
2. Nedco - E60HN-16ELEC/003/HN
3. Wesco - E60HN-16ELEC/005/HN
4. Marchand - E60HN-16ELEC/010/HN
5. EECOL Electric - E60HN-16ELEC/013/HN
6. Seivad - E60HN-16ELEC/015/HN
7. Test Equity - E60HN-16ELEC/016/HN

#### Tender Parameters
- The contract value is not yet specified.
- Delivery is required on or before March 31st, 2024.
- The procurement is subject to the Tlicho agreement.
- The basis of selection is the lowest compliant bid.

#### Integrity Regime
The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. All tenders must comply with the Integrity Regime requirements.

#### Aboriginal Procurement
The RCMP encourages Aboriginal businesses to participate in this tender. The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for Aboriginal businesses to increase their visibility and compete for federal government contracts.

#### Tender Submission
Tenders must be submitted electronically to [julie.frigon@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.frigon@rcmp-grc.gc.ca). The CanadaBuy portal will be used
